name: @kronos-integration/interceptor-object-data-processor-row
description: Splits a line by a sparator into tokens.

scripts.cover: c8 -x 'tests/**/*' --temp-directory build/tmp ava --timeout 2m && c8 report -r lcov -o build/coverage --temp-directory build/tmp
scripts.docs: documentation readme ./src/line-header-intercetor.mjs --section=API && documentation readme ./src/interceptor.mjs --section=API && documentation readme ./src/module.mjs --section=API && documentation readme ./src/message-handler-interceptor.mjs --section=API
scripts.lint: documentation lint ./src/line-header-intercetor.mjs && documentation lint ./src/interceptor.mjs && documentation lint ./src/module.mjs && documentation lint ./src/message-handler-interceptor.mjs
